body: Hey, I've finally decided to make an AMA, so here we go! You guys can ask me anything you'd like, questions that I don't think follow the rules won't be answered. Anyways, here we go!
body_tagged: Hey, I've finally decided to make an AMA, so here we go! You guys can ask me anything you'd like, questions that I don't think follow the rules won't be answered. Anyways, here we go!
title: First AMA In Evar ;)

replies.body: On a scale of 1 to 10 what's your favourite colour of the alphabet?
replies.body_tagged: On a scale of 1 to 10 what's your favourite colour of the alphabet?

replies.body: Moo, that's gotta be the most vivid color
replies.body_tagged: Moo, that's gotta be the most vivid color

replies.body:
Silly questions:
Using a calculator in degree mode, find the tangent of 90.
Which would you rather have: pancake-flavored cheese or cheese-flavored pancakes?
Have you ever eaten something and then immediately spewed it back out because it tasted so bad?

Serious questions:
When and how did you find out about this network?
Has anyone ever criticized your pvp abilities? (constructive or rage)
replies.body_tagged:
Silly questions:
Using a calculator in degree mode, find the tangent of 90.
Which would you rather have: pancake-flavored cheese or cheese-flavored pancakes?
Have you ever eaten something and then immediately spewed it back out because it tasted so bad?

Serious questions:
When and how did you find out about this network?
Has anyone ever criticized your pvp abilities? (constructive or rage)

replies.body:
@Cyn

I'll do that math later 

Syrup would block out the taste, so cheese-flavored pancakes

Seafood, long story

Found out about MCZone a few years ago, played on an alt but now on my main

I always try to make myself better at PvP, and now I'm not as bad ;)

@Cyn

replies.body: How many names have people spelt your new name wrong so far?
replies.body_tagged: How many names have people spelt your new name wrong so far?

replies.body:
@Petlas

Prepare for a long list

Typos for Seuthslayer: Sleuthsayer, Seuthsayer, Sleuthslayer, Soothslayer (idek how they got that xD).

Typos for Seuth: Sleuth, Sueth, about a million people calling me Seth

Typos for Thyphis: Thyphus, Typhus, Thiphis, Thuphis, Thypjis, Thypgis


icrievrytim

replies.body:
@Thomas_Shoe I'm working on a map right now, but I haven't made any other maps, so I'll just tell you my favorite map for each minigame

Nebula, TDM, CTW: Campi Embrosi, Zao 1/2, Justice 2

SG: Ravenous Drift

Walls: SmallCrypt

Nexus: Edron

CTH: Starburst
